description: This file contains unit tests for the ZoomTools class, testing various methods such as token retrieval, meeting scheduling, retrieval, listing, recordings, and deletion, with mock responses and error handling.

methods.name: zoom_tools
methods.description: Fixture creating an instance of ZoomTools with mock credentials

methods.name: mock_token_response
methods.description: Fixture providing a mock successful token response

methods.name: test_init_with_credentials
methods.description: Tests initialization of ZoomTools with explicit credentials

methods.name: test_init_with_env_vars
methods.description: Tests initialization of ZoomTools using environment variables

methods.name: test_get_access_token_success
methods.description: Tests successful retrieval of access token

methods.name: test_get_access_token_reuse
methods.description: Tests token reuse when not expired

methods.name: test_get_access_token_failure
methods.description: Tests handling of token retrieval failure

methods.name: test_api_methods_auth_failure
methods.description: Tests API methods handling authentication failure

methods.name: test_schedule_meeting_success
methods.description: Tests successful scheduling of a meeting

methods.name: test_get_meeting_success
methods.description: Tests successful retrieval of a meeting

methods.name: test_delete_meeting_success
methods.description: Tests successful deletion of a meeting

methods.name: test_api_methods_request_failure
methods.description: Tests handling of request failures in API methods
